page.title: 10ESKDALEMUIR PARISH SCHOOL
page.content: When trees largely replaced sheep the population of Eskdalemuir fell gradually, shepherds cottages became holiday houses or homes for the retired . The school roll fell from an average of forty pupils to the present all time low of eleven children. Eskdalemuir school provides a suitable curriculum for all stages of primary educationcovering subjects such as number and mathematical relationships, spoken and written expression, reading ,environmental studies.Also art and craft music and physical education.There are lessons for recorder guitar and piano. Emphasis is placed on the aquisition of basic skills of literacy and numeracy ,but the broader aspects of personal developement are of considered equally important.
